title: How to Get Good on the Gears of War Shotgun

steps.headline: Press start go to options and change sensitivity to high.
steps.description: This will ensure the opponent does not roll around you and blast you to the next dimension.

steps.headline: Practice in Annex mode, you can re spawn after getting killed.
Active reloads are key to a 1 on 1 shotgun battle, it is easier to down them from a distance.
Never try to shoot some one, unless downed, from more that 10 feet (3.0 m) away.
steps.description: If they are down you can kill them but not as quickly as with pistol or lancer.

steps.headline: Aim if you are 5 feet (1.5 m) away or they are unsuspecting, otherwise try to almost stab them with the end and shoot them.
If your team is with you, stay behind them and get easy kills after the enemies are weakened.
Tactics, not brute force is the way to go.
steps.description: Weaken them with your lancer while running at them and switch to your shotgun and blast 'em.

steps.headline: Try to flank around and when somebody is charging you, aim where their head is going to be and hold the trigger.
If you aren't good at aiming from the hip, try quickly tapping LT and then firing; but it slows down your firing rate a bit.
Corners to surprise enemies are always your friend.
